net = op.network.Cubic(shape=[10, 10, 10], connectivity=26)
a = np.mean(net.num_neighbors(pores=net.Ps, flatten=False))
b = 20.952
assert a == b
topotools.reduce_coordination(network=net, z=6)
a = np.mean(net.num_neighbors(pores=net.Ps, flatten=False))
b = 6.0
assert_allclose(a, b)
h = net.check_network_health()
assert h.health
